hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to the #Zora Sapphire#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #3# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #a Small Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Giant's Knife# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

HC (Malon).text: Did you know that Barinade, Volvagia and Twinrova hard require the Boomerang, Megaton Hammer and Mirror Shield, respectively?

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Map Room Side Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the path of #time#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Goron Pot's happy face# spits out #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #1# major item.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Bolero of Fire# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Deku Stick#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #lighting flames in the royal tomb# rewards #an Ice Trap#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Minuet of Forest#.

ZF (Jabu).text: Fell for it, didn't you, fool? Junk hint cross split attack!

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Minuet of Forest#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #an Ice Trap#.
